an3.163-182:1: (63) "Bhikkhus, one possessing three qualities is deposited in hell as if brought there. What three? () One destroys life oneself, (2) encourages others to destroy life, and (3) approves of the destruction of life. One possessing these three qualities is deposited in hell as if brought there."
an3.163-182:2: (164) "Bhikkhus, one possessing three qualities is deposited in heaven as if brought there. What three? (1) One abstains from the destruction of life oneself, () encourages others to abstain from the destruction of life, and (3) approves of abstaining from the destruction of life. One possessing these three qualities is deposited in heaven as if brought there."
